job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields

primary: Azure Tech (AKS, Function Apps, KQL, ADF)
all: Azure Tech (AKS, Function Apps, KQL, ADF)

jd: Hello, I’m a Technical Recruiter with Yochana Solutions Inc., a national IT staffing solutions provider with 14 plus years of experience delivering value to leading companies across the U.S and Canada. I'm currently staffing for Azure Cloud Developer – Phoenix AZ ( Onsite ). Below you will find the job description, if you are qualified and interested please send me your Updated Word Document Resume. My apologies if this position is not an ideal fit, we'll keep you in mind for other suitable positions and referrals would be appreciated. Thank you in advance. Role: Azure Cloud DeveloperLocation: Phoenix AZ ( Onsite )Vendor / Client: Direct Vendor Duration: Contract Job Summary:Mandatory Skills:1.Cloud Computing and Azure Services Proficiency: A deep understanding of cloud computing concepts is crucial. You should be proficient in Azure services, including: Azure Computing, Angular, C#, HTML, SQL, PowerApps, API ; Azure Tech (AKS, Function Apps, KQL, ADF).2. Data Modeling and Database Management: a. Designing effective data models is essential. You'll work with both SQL and NoSQL databases. b. Ensure data is structured and stored optimally for efficient querying and analysis.3. ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) Processes: a. Proficiency in ETL techniques is vital for data integration and processing. b. Extract, transform, and load data efficiently to support analytics and reporting.4.Programming Languages: a. Familiarity with programming languages such as C# , Python, Scala, and .NET is valuable. b. Python, in particular, is widely used for data manipulation and analytics.5.Data Warehousing and Data Lakes: Understand data warehousing concepts and data lakes. These are fundamental for managing large-scale data.6.Problem-Solving and Collaboration: Soft skills matter too! Effective problem-solving and teamwork enhance your ability to drive data-driven decisions.Desired Experience :-Overall 5- 7+ years of Data warehousing experience, including:- 1.Minimum of 5 years of experience in Azure Computing, Angular, C#, HTML, SQL, PowerApps, API.2.Education: Relevant degree (Bachelor's or Master's) in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields. 3.Certifications: Consider certifications related to Azure (e.g., Azure Data Engineer, Azure Solutions Architect). 4.Experience: Proficiency in designing, implementing, and managing data solutions on the Azure cloud platform.To develop and deliver ,detailed solutions through consulting project activitiesTo perform qualitative and/or quantitative analyses to assist in the identification of client issues and the development of client-specific solutionsTo coordinate with Internal and external stakeholders to ensure effective deliver of client specific solutionTo design, structure and deliver reports and presentations that are appropriate to the characteristics or needs of the audienceTo cultivate successful customer relationships.
